resources.string: "This app is intended to help in language learning. There is a method of learning languages which is listening to audio dialogues of length of about 1 minute. Such a dialog must be listened in cycle for about 20 minutes. It's preferable that the dialog doesn't contain any ambient sounds."

"First create a pair of languages. A pair consists of two languages - audio language and translation language. You may create any quantity of pairs. For adding and selecting pairs tap Select language pair. For a selected pair you can create dialogs. There's two buttons for adding one dialog and adding a directory. A dialog consists of a ling to audio file which must be placed on your phone. An original text, which you can read and a translation for this text (all optional). You must also provide a name for a dialog (any name). After that you can listen to dialog using play/pause button. Additions buttons let you see original text"
